dashboard.label: Admin Domains
dashboard.description: Displays administrative domains and their associated configurations and user assignments.

search.query: index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:admin_domains | stats count BY domain_type
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:admin_domains | stats dc(user_id) AS "User Count" BY domain_name | sort - "User Count"
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:admin_domains | timechart count BY domain_name
index=firemon sourcetype=firemon:admin_domains | table _time, domain_id, domain_name, domain_type, user_id, user_role | sort -_time
